resources.string: Calculate the time of pregnancy according to the Date of Last Menstruation (DUM)

The first field (First US) is for calculating gestational age based on the date the first ultrasound was performed in this pregnancy, and the second field (weeks) is for the weeks reported in the report for that ultrasound.

The first field (First echo) is for calculating gestational age based on the date the first ultrasound was performed in this pregnancy, and the second field (weeks) is for the weeks reported in the report for that ultrasound.
The date for which gestational age is calculated. By default it is the current date, but it can be modified to know how many weeks are fulfilled on a specific date.
Corrected LMP refers to the date of the last menstruation adapted to the ultrasound report. It is an estimate calculation to unify dates.
Displays the gestational age for the date set, by default, for the current date.
Shows the date the weeks entered in the field are fulfilled
Show help when clicking on text boxes
New: The option to save the data of the last menstruation or date of the first ultrasound is added, for the control of a single pregnancy
